title: Can't create new club
body:
Hi,
I recently transferred my account from EUNE to EUW, I wanted to create a club just now but it won't let me after choosing its name (no matter what name). Is club creating disabled now or it has to do something with me transfering?

replies.body: There shouldn't be any issues with creating clubs right now.  Are you on the updated client?  If so, what happens if you try on the legacy?  Let me know!
on updated client Clubs is just simply grayed out and I cannot click it, on legacy client it doesn't let me create a club after I choose its name (you can click on Create button but nothing happens).

That sounds strange and we'd like to take a closer look at your club issue.  Hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new) and our tech team will investigate this individually with you.  We'll figure this out!
